title: Marvel Review App
description: This app, once signed in, lets the user search for any character/comicbook. The user may also create a character review as well as view any review.
languages: Handlebars, Bootstrap4, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Ajax, NodeJS, Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Passport, Bcrypt, Marvel API.

title: Table Scraps
description: Recipe costing app that prevents money and food waste. User can add ingredients to their recipe which displays total cost of all ingredients.
languages: React, Bootstrap4, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Axios, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, Passport, Bcrypt, usda.gov API.

title: Personality Test
description: Click the begin button, take the test, fill out form at bottom to sign in, and then view youre results.
languages: Handlebars, Bootstrap4, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Ajax, NodeJS, Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Bcrypt.

title: topicsearch.
description: This is a basic topic search app. Once topic is entered and searched, user will be displayed with 3 fun gif cards, and 4 related news articles with links to the original article.
languages: HTML5, Bootstrap4, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Ajax, GNews API, Giphy API.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This is a front-end, simple weather application. You enter a city and you are displayed with the current forecast as well as a 5-day forecast.
languages: HTML5, Bootstrap4, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Ajax, Openweathermap API.

title: Employee Directory
description: This app is basically a list of all office characters and you can search the list, or filter by department. You can even sort by Alphabetical order.
languages: React, Bootstrap4, CSS3, Javascript, NodeJS, Express.
